0.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 90
Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank is damaged to  30% maximum health, he first generates a  shield equal to  30% of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank is damaged to  30% maximum health, he first generates a shield equal to  30% of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.
markedPassages: 30% maximum health
30% maximum health
shield
30% of maximum mana

0.text: Active: Blitzcrank fires his right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage,  stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and  pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are  revealed.
0.html: Active: Blitzcrank fires his right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage, stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: stunning
pulling
revealed

1.text: Blitzcrank is  unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
1.html: Blitzcrank is unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
markedPassages: unable

0.text: CAST TIME: NONE
Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and  bonus movement speed that decays to 10% over the first 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and  bonus movement speed that decays to 10% over the first 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
bonus movement speed

1.text: When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is  slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowed

0.text: CAST TIME: NONE
Active: Blitzcrank empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, deal 100% AD bonus physical damage and  knock up the target for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Blitzcrank empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, deal 100% AD bonus physical damage and knock up the target for 1 second.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
knock up

1.text: Power Fist  resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
1.html: Power Fist resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  600
Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack, stacking up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 stack is consumed to deal magic damage.
0.html: Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack, stacking up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 stack is consumed to deal magic damage.

1.text: Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and  silencing them for 0.5 seconds.
1.html: Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and silencing them for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shields
silencing
